name: Peon Sounds
description: Expressive game sound effects for agent voice personality. Play sounds from 75+ packs (Warcraft, Duke Nukem, GLaDOS, Deadpool, StarCraft, etc.) via tool calls.

activePack.description: Default/primary voice pack name (shown in full in prompt)

enabledPacks.description: Whitelist of pack names to use. If omitted, all English packs are available.

maxPromptPacks.description: Max pack names to list in system prompt summary
